title: Practice Challenge
description: Create an app that shows: Use MediaQuery or GridView.extent! ---
instructions: Create an app that shows: Use MediaQuery or GridView.extent! ---

hints.text: GridView.extent auto-adjusts columns based on maxCrossAxisExtent
MediaQuery.sizeOf(context).width gives screen width for manual breakpoints

commonMistakes.mistake: Using hardcoded column count instead of maxCrossAxisExtent
commonMistakes.consequence: Grid doesn't adapt to different screen sizes
commonMistakes.correction: Use GridView.extent with maxCrossAxisExtent for auto columns

commonMistakes.mistake: Forgetting to wrap GridView in Expanded inside Column
commonMistakes.correction: Wrap GridView in Expanded when inside Column

commonMistakes.consequence: Unnecessary rebuilds on any MediaQuery change
